title: How to restore IAT?
content: I have the start address and the end address of the IAT now im trying to restore the table/folder of it. the start address is: E7C000 thx for helping

comments.text: Welcome to RE.SE! If this is part of an unpacking effort it may be a bit more complicated than what you seem to be expecting. Providing more information in your question may be helpful here.

answers_data.content: I used Explorer Suite for patching IAT.

comments.text: While this may answer the question, it's a bit thin on the details. It would be nice if you could flesh that out a bit, for example with a screenshot showing what to change where ...

To be honest, it seems I was wrong when answered the question. I used Explorer Suite for adding new libs and changing addresses of some functions. At the same time, the question implies restoring the original Import Table after deobfuscation.
I'd usually go with LordPE to rebuild the IAT, it doesn't need a lot of help.
@slinkin - If you were wrong about it, then perhaps you should delete the answer before it gets downvotes
@0xC0000022L .. no, I haven't come across any, but there are many projects out there on GH etc so it wouldn't surprise me.
